About

This is a work-in-progress implementation of a path tracer, largely based on Peter Shirleyâ€™s Ray Tracing in One Weekend series of tutorials plus other resources. It currently runs on MacOS and is CPU only. However the plan is to add CUDA support (perhaps Vulkan and/or Metal too) as well as to continue extending its features.

A detailed writeup of the project will follow as I continue developing this project.
